field.name: collectionyear
field.label: COM_ETHAAE_QDATA_FORM_LBL_QDATA_COLLECTIONYEAR
field.query: SELECT DISTINCT d.collectionyear, c.academic_reference_year as val FROM `#__ethaae_qdata_data` as d INNER JOIN #__ethaae_qdata_collections as c on c.collection_year = d.collectionyear order by d.collectionyear DESC

field.name: instituteid
field.label: COM_ETHAAE_QDATA_FORM_LBL_QDATA_INSTITUTEID
field.query: SELECT DISTINCT i.id as id, i.title_el AS val FROM `#__ethaae_qdata_data` AS a INNER JOIN #__ethaae_institutes_structure AS i ON i.id = a.unitid WHERE i.`unit_grouping` = '1' AND i.startupdate is not null ORDER BY i.unit_grouping,i.title_el ASC
